titleNullable: COVID-19 and Normal X-ray Dataset: Balanced
subtitleNullable: Equally Balanced COVID-19 and Normal Chest X-ray Dataset for Deep Learning
descriptionNullable: This dataset comprises a total of 800 high-quality chest X-ray images, with 400 images depicting COVID-19 infected patients and the other 400 images representing normal cases (i.e., non-COVID patients). The dataset is equally balanced, with an equal distribution of COVID-19 and normal cases, making it ideal for deep learning and medical research purposes.
title: COVID-19 and Normal X-ray Dataset: Balanced

The dataset is equally balanced, with an equal distribution of COVID-19 and normal cases, making it ideal for deep learning and medical research purposes.
